channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth reposts video of pastors saying women shouldn't vote
item.description: Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth reposted the video profiling Christian Nationalist Pastor Doug Wilson, who opposes same-sex marriage.

item.title: Asylum-seekers thought they were following the rules. Now some are told to start over
item.description: NPR has learned that dozens of immigrants across the U.S. have received letters notifying them that their asylum cases have been dismissed because the...

item.title: How Kentucky bourbon went from boom to bust
item.description: Tariffs, oversupply and teetotaling Gen-Zs have all contributed to the downfall of one of America's most iconic liquors.

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: 3 hurt in Times Square shooting, 17-year-old arrested, NYPD says
item.description: Three people were hurt in a shooting in Times Square overnight Friday, New York City police say.

item.title: Watch: Masked thieves steal $7k of Labubu dolls in California
item.description: The LA County Sheriff's Department says it is investigating the incident.

item.title: Protesters in Israel intensify pressure against plan to expand Gaza war
item.description: Meanwhile in Gaza, five people, including two children, died in the past 24 hours from malnutrition, the Hamas-run health ministry said.

item.title: 8/9: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Shooter near Emory University campus found dead on second floor of CVS Pharmacy, police say; In an MLB first, woman umpires regular-season game

item.title: The Strange Shooting of Alex Pennig
item.description: A nurse is found dead in her apartment. Surveillance video captures her coming home for the last time. Can investigators piece together what happened ...

item.title: Thousands protest in Israel over Gaza City occupation plan
item.description: BBC correspondent Emir Nader speaks to demonstrators against the Israel's plans for Gaza, including a former soldier who says he no longer supports th...

item.title: How a small piece of a bathroom door lock helped solve a nurse's murder
item.description: A metal ring, about the size of a quarter, led to Matthew Ecker's murder charge for the death of Alexandra Pennig.

item.title: Ukraine's European allies say peace talks must include Kyiv
item.description: The White House says Trump is open to Ukraine joining talks with Putin on Friday, as Zelensky insists any deal without Kyiv is a “dead decision”.

item.title: CDC shooter believed COVID vaccine made him suicidal, his father tells police

item.title: 4 people and 5 months in space, NASA's Crew-10 mission safely returns to Earth

item.title: Texas big game hunter killed while stalking African Cape buffalo
item.description: Asher Watkins had been tracking a cape buffalo for the kill when the animal instead turned its attack on the hunter.

item.title: Astronauts return to Earth with SpaceX after 5 months at the International Space Station
Suspected gunman and police officer dead in shooting near the CDC and Emory University, police say
